ai-tha-ap418:1.1_0: “Holy One, the Holy One has become fully extinguished
ai-tha-ap418:1.2_0: in the world with its gods and humans,
ai-tha-ap418:1.3_0: May all people, gods and humans.

ai-tha-ap418:2.4_0: If you make them worship the Teacher,
ai-tha-ap418:3.1_0: not far away from the herd,
ai-tha-ap418:3.4_0: I lamped on the light of a lamp,
ai-tha-ap418:4.4_0: I went to the company of the Thirty-Three.
ai-tha-ap418:5.3_0: I can recall one hundred thousand
ai-tha-ap418:5.4_0: and killing me in the house.
ai-tha-ap418:6.1_0: like the sun shining in the stomach.
ai-tha-ap418:7.2_0: even the mountains of a mountain cave—
ai-tha-ap418:7.4_0: I see him with the eye,
ai-tha-ap418:8.2_0: which delights in the heavenly realm.
ai-tha-ap418:8.4_0: acting as ruler of the gods.
ai-tha-ap418:9.1_0: (These eighth day) and the fourth month.
ai-tha-ap418:10.1_0: After passing away from the world of the gods,
ai-tha-ap418:11.1_0: it’s ruined with birth and old age.
ai-tha-ap418:12.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
ai-tha-ap418:13.2_0: Even if a mountain cleft person sinks
ai-tha-ap418:13.3_0: having seen (that), I see the faultless -
ai-tha-ap418:15.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap418:15.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap418:17.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap418:19.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Senior.
